text: September unemployment rates ranged from 2% in South Dakota to 5.6% in Nevada.
Q2 2024 house price growth over the year ranged from 1.1% in ID to 13.4% in VT.
Q2 2024 real state GDP growth over the year ranged from -0.6% in ND to 4.9% in SC.
Among states, September average weekly earnings ranged from MS’s $941 to WA’s $1,441.
Manufacturing jobs in September 2024 were above September 2023 levels in 8 states.
Every state and DC saw year-over-year retail GDP growth exceed 6% in real terms in Q2 2024.
North Carolina’s unemployment rate has been below 4% since November 2021.
Retail and trade employment was up for 24 states in September 2024 compared to 2019 levels.
Between Q2 2018 and Q2 2024, AZ’s real manufacturing GDP grew from $33 billion to $46 billion.
NC’s annual house price growth has exceeded 5% every quarter since 2015.
